name: Scelestum
description:
You are an investigator tasked with uncovering the mystery of which monster has attacked the village. Use the tools at your disposal to discover the clues left by the monster attack, and identify the correct creature. Try to solve the mystery alone, or work together as a team. Be careful as night falls as there are often other dangers that will try to prey on the unsuspecting.

Solve more monster attacks to earn greater renown among your peers, and earn gold for completing missions and bonus objectives. Buy new items or upgrades to help you on more difficult missions.

  • Single player / Multiplayer co-op: Play alone or with up to 4 friends online and work together.

  • Solve Puzzles: Not everything is as it seems, and you will need to solve puzzles left behind by the villagers to uncover the truth.

  • Re-playable Missions: Going back to the same village will result in a different monster, different puzzle solutions and items in different locations.


  • Difficulty Levels: As the mission difficulty increases the puzzles will also change, you will have to keep your wits about you.


  • Many potential monsters: Over 10 potential monsters all leaving different evidence of their presence.


  • Complete bonus objectives Complete additional bonus objectives to earn more money and buy better items.

  • Beware the night: Night can be dangerous in abandoned places, can you survive until morning?
